title: The APDL Public Domain Library (RISC OS)
description:
+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
        |                                                                      |
        |   Supplied......:  Acorn Antiques    Release name..:  APDL_LIB.rar   |
        |   Packaged......:  filth             Release type..:  Util           |
        |   Protection....:  none              Language......:  English        |
        |   Crack/SN......:  n/a               Size..........:  1.26 GB        |
        |   Format........:  RAR               OS............:  RISC OS        |
        |                                                                      |
        |   MD5 checksum.................: 3f25356953a34e025ae37d2b34f1fcc6    |
        |                                                                      |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                            Description                               |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                                                                      |
        |   The entire APDL Public Domain Library, now easy accessible to you  |
        |   in this handy torrent! Please view the "library.htm" file when     |
        |   your download is complete, to see a full hyperlinked listing of    |
        |   the floppy images available.                                       |
        |                                                                      |
        |   Contents include the following:                                    |
        |                                                                      |
        |   APDL info - the original introduction to the APDL library          |
        |   All catalogues in a zip file (340K)                                |
        |   Main catalogue - most of the main programs and utilities           |
        |    + Main discs                                                      |
        |   Games catalogue - Games, desktop 'sillies' and other amusemants    |
        |    + Games discs                                                     |
        |   Demo and Magazine catalogue - 'Demos' and disc based magazines     |
        |    + Demo discs                                                      |
        |    + Magazine discs                                                  |
        |   Sounds catalogue - Sound samples and music files, various formats  |
        |    + Sounds - sound samples, Coconizer, Maestro tunes                |
        |    + Tracker - Tracker and Sound Tracker tunes                       |
        |    + Digital Symphony - thousands of Digital Symphony tunes          |
        |   Commercial catalogue - originally all of the commercial software,  |
        |   pre-registered Shareware and other odds and ends APDL sold. Now    |
        |   just various commercial 'demo' discs.                              |
        |    + Commercial demo discs                                           |
        |   DTP catalogue - Clip art and other pictures                        |
        |   'DP0 to DP9' discs. The main clip art section                      |
        |   DP100 discs individual collections                                 |
        |   DC discs clip art 'theme packs'                                    |
        |   ArtWorks                                                           |
        |                                                                      |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                                                                      |
        |   Note: this torrent is an archived copy of the material freely      |
        |   available at http://www.apdl.co.uk/library/library.htm             |
        |                                                                      |
        |   We at Acorn Antiques would like to thank Dave Holden of APDL for   |
        |   all of his hard work in compiling and making available on his      |
        |   website all of these PD files! Thanks Dave, without you it would   |
        |   never have been possible!                                          |
        |                                                                      |
        +----------------------------------------------------------------------+
        |                                                                      |
        |   Visit our profile for more, including some vary rare releases!     |

        |   Do your part to help, but please do support legitimate developers! |
